website_summaries.verdict: Excellent for DIY ear examination. Highly innovative design and operation. Clearly display the inner ear on your smartphone or tablet.
pros: Adjustable light brightness settings, with unique blue LED setting for a clear inspection of the canal and ear drum
Easy to set up with functional adapter for standard USB and micro USB
cons: Not compatible with iPhone or iPad

customer_reviews.title: Read the directions. Great customer service response time.
customer_reviews.text: This has looked into many narrow spaces for me. Ears human and animal. Dark spaces behind and under furnishings and equipment. Already found enough lost items and easy repairs to pay for itself. I have used it on my android tablet and directly plugged in to my desktop. I am glad I got this. I have not yet tested to see if it is water resistant....works as a low magnifier for small objects and the variable light control allows for best possible illumination of jewelry or other treasures of interest. And it is fun.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: High quality and recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bought the scope for months. I initially bought this scope trying to catch my 1-year-old son's ear infection. But, unfortunately, I was over expected. However, I found out it worked perfectly as a simple ear scope help cleansing earwax. The picture is high quality for this price. The only thing I think is not convenience is that it is not compatible with IOS system. I can not connect to my iPhone. I have to use my computer to connect the scope every time.
customer_reviews.author: SERENA

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if this would work for everyone, ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this would work for everyone, especially if you're not an experience doctor. Since I'm not it's difficult for me to understand what exactly I'm looking for, especially on little kids. But the camera itself works very well. The program is a little difficult to set up on a laptop and is not compatible with the iphone but it works well with the husbands android and the picture is very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Depstech USB Otoscope, Digital Ear Scope
customer_reviews.text: Arrived safe and sound. After a small software download I tried it out right away on a PC. Took only a little bit of study to get familiar with it. I in my opinion. It's fantastic device at a wonderful price. I showed me what I was suspecting with good clarity as good as any YouTube video on the same subject or perhaps better. This is a very nice cost effective buy for anyone. Grand kid thought it was cool too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Beymer

customer_reviews.title: Works great once you figure it out, comes with no directions!
customer_reviews.text: Comes with zero instructions so I was a bit confused and because I have an iphone the PC was the only option. I plugged it in but the computer didn't detect any hardware... read a few reviews and figured out that I needed to open up the camera on my computer and then flip it to back facing camera... that did it! Clear as day pictures of the inside of our ears!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: It's useless.
customer_reviews.text: Their software is NOT on Google Play or their website for this unit. Every other product they make is on there, but not this one. And even if you could find it, they decided not to hire anyone who actually speaks English, so the instructions are useless (I installed the software for a different product, an endoscope, and I didn't even realize it for 20 minutes, trying to get it to work, because the instructions were in broken English.
customer_reviews.author: ZipBeep

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service! Great company!
customer_reviews.text: Original review: Neat camera, but does not do well on small spaces, which is what it is supposed to be used for. 2nd review: after I rated this product the company contacted me and asked why I was not satisfied with their product. I told them why and they offered to refund my money and send a new improved otoscope. I receive the new one and love it. The customer service has been wonderful and I got the product I wanted. I really appreciate it and would buy from depstech again!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Unuseable
customer_reviews.text: The company is very responsive and tried to make good. I give them 5 stars for trying. It is not iPhone compatible. You need to configure a separate movie screen app to view. The downloadable app is insufficient. The depth of field makes this nearly useless for visualizing the ear (tympanic membrane). I am a physician so I have 40 years experience with otoscopes. Great idea. Not well implemented.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Image!
customer_reviews.text: The device works great at inspecting ears, but here are some different photos taken with the camera. The first is of grains of salt (0.4 millimeters across) and an American penny. There is some slight aliasing noted when examining the salt grains, but this would be unnoticeable when examining the ear. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: USELESS BECAUSE SOFTWARE NO LONGER WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! The software quit working and has not been updated in over a year. Every time I open it, it just crashes and closes. It worked fine when I first got it but now it's useless without the software. The issue may be that it is not compatible with Android Pie but they're still selling it. Sorry I bought this one since the developers aren't updating the software. It is really rude to continue to sell an item that you don't actively maintain the software for. It's now a rip-off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: 4 Star
customer_reviews.text: Advantage you can see all the conditions inside the ear Very clear, although it is the fixed lens, but its focus is just enough to let you clearly see the situation in the ear to ensure that you want to clean your ears. Defect The ear spoons that are used with the otoscope are short, and if you have earwax in the depths, you may not be able to touch it. All in all, recommend and you can know what happened in your ear.
customer_reviews.author: Lunder

customer_reviews.title: Revolutionary junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought one year ago and it worked but image was blurry. Tried to use it again a year later but it will not connect. Following minimal instructions, I went to support page to download driver but will not connect. Model number is not on the box or manual so I had to try different models that looked similar. Lots of computer jargon and variables. Nothing worked. I guess if I was an IT guy or had a lot of time to waste I could get it to work, but its going in the thrash. Oh happy day. More electronic waste.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: View ear wax ....what you can't see by your eyes
customer_reviews.text: Small and convenience. D/L software into phone, plug in the device/ devices and see hair inside your ears ! This device helps to check/ see what you want to see. And has to be close to the object for viewing about an inch / or two. A bit hard to fingure out top / bottom of an object for the 1st few times when doing it yourself. After fingure it out / or get used to it, just turn it around. Like those plastic funels. They make picture more clear than w/o them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ears are gross.
customer_reviews.text: As someone with chronic lifelong ear problems...I suspected an ear infection...and I was right! Sent the recording over to my doctor and got some antibiotics! My only complaint is that it only comes with one size to attach to the camera, and I have very small ears...like pediatric size. In retrospect, I should have searched for a pediatric scope. It's also nifty as a bore scope...I was able to find some things behind my desk. :D
customer_reviews.author: MeganTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good value scope
customer_reviews.text: The camera works great the only problem is sometimes finding the problem to start the camera can be cumbersome, you have to download the drivers from the website but overall it is a good camera for the money it shows inside your ear very well. There is no HD format so it looks like a WebCam inside your ear.
customer_reviews.author: Chicagofoodking

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know I had
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know I had built up dead excess dry skin inside my ear canal until I bought this product. Saved me money by not having to go to the doctors to remove it. I did it myself with tweezers while using the camera.
customer_reviews.author: J. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Too big for small children and doesnt work on newer android OS
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty good for the price. It worked well at first. Despite the large size funnel to fit in the ear, I used it on my 3 yr old daughter. The last time I used it the tip popped off the end and my daughter smashed it into her ear. Thankfully no perforation, but did cut the ear canal. Just tried it several months later on myself and it will no longer work on my phone. Could be due to the recent OS update. I basically now own an inoperable scope.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: This scope worked great for about 5 months. My daughter gets frequent ear infections but they do not cause her pain. The only way we know is when she can't hear very well. I bought this so I could look in to see if her ear is infected or maybe just wax. Now the app I was using seems to no longer exist so the scope is now useless and I'm out 20+ dollars. If I could return it for a refund I would.
customer_reviews.author: JLT143

customer_reviews.title: I was actually a little surprised how well this worked.
customer_reviews.text: I was kinda expecting this to be really crappy, based on some of my experiences with other cheap electronic items I have bought. I was expecting instructions that were hard to decipher, software that didn't work, lots of tinkering to ge the thing to work, etc. On this item, even though it was about the cheapest version of a usb Otoscope I saw on amazon, worked really well. The instructions were easy and simple to follow. The installation of the software was simple and the otoscope worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: DKDCDL

customer_reviews.title: May need to use alternative camera app
customer_reviews.text: Directions suggested a camera app that would not run on my phone. An e-mail to customer service was answered quickly and suggested using alternative camera apps such as CameraFi or CameraFi 2 or Teslong camera. I am up and running perfectly now! It would be nice if the camera was just a bit smaller but this has the same listed size as most others. Great tool for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Herb H

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth the trouble
customer_reviews.text: The app that you have to download doesn't work on my phone (up-to-date Pixel 3). Luckily I had an older Android device that could run the app without crashing. But, after all that trouble (an hour of troubleshooting) I discovered that the camera is so large that it cannot fit far enough into my ear for me to see my ear drum. The provided tips also do not have any sort of clip to keep them on and so they easily fall off. Pretty much a waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: C. LaFave

customer_reviews.title: freezes up.  not reliable.  very frustrating
customer_reviews.text: received my camera, installed the software and was able to get an image on the screen. Then the camera froze up. Image doesn't change for 15 seconds or so. Comes back to life for 5 seconds. Freezes for 15 seconds. terrible! Emailed the vendor that sent another camera. Hooked it up. Guess what? image stays on for 10 seconds then freezes, wait 10 seconds, get 10 seconds of images with this one, then freezes again. Seems to suffer from terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kanga

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable as an Otoscope
customer_reviews.text: The adapters are too large to use to view eardrums. It worked OK in my ears (I'm a big guy... 6'1" 220lbs ... presumably with large ear canals to match) , but it would not fit inside my wife's or child's ear. My wife had a doctor appointment during which she asked to take home one of the one-time-use plastic adapters from the doctor's Otoscope. The doctor's professional Otoscope adapter was much skinner than the smallest adapter that comes with this product. I would NOT recommend this product for in-ear / Otoscope use.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron O

customer_reviews.title: Useful and simple
customer_reviews.text: I get frequent ear infections and earaches with no infection, so this is really helpful for me to check up on my ears before deciding if I should see my doctor. My laptop has a microUSB so it was very easy to download the software (following the instructions that came with the camera), plug it in and use it immediately. The software starts up when the camera is plugged in too, which is very convenient. It gives clear images and has four different sizes for your ear canal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Software shows unsafe on Norton
customer_reviews.text: The camera worked fine when I got it and downloaded the software to use it. Then the software was flagged as unsafe by my Norton virus protection software so I deleted it. I wanted to use the camera again so I looked for the software again with no luck and could not find it so I downloaded something else that did not provide a clear view. I am going to pitch the crap and go back to having someone else look at my ears with a regular scope.
customer_reviews.author: John Faircloth

customer_reviews.title: This is a great otoscope to have for home use!
customer_reviews.text: Despite all the bad reviews, i found this otoscope to exceed my expectations. The problem i ran into was finding correct software to run it. Find the correct app on Playstore under the name Depstech Camera. The light was perfect in order to see clearly. i wish i had this when my kids were younger. A great buy! Btw, i use it on my Samsung 7 Edge Android phone. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: BradshawBunch

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in November to use when my kids ears start to bother them. Fortunately, this year they haven't had many ear infections. Unfortunately, I didn't get it out of the box to use (no ear problems) until after the return date had passed. When I did get it out to use, it power surged our PC. We tried a second time and same result. Guess we're out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: momstimeout

customer_reviews.title: Very cool!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting an otoscope for a while but of course with a regular one, I could not have checked out my own ears. This is way cool and very easy to use. However, the app does not work with the latest Android version. I did download a different app: "Endoscope Camera" which it is working excellent with! If this review has helped you in any way, please click the YES button. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: BlueZebra

customer_reviews.title: Great for at home care
customer_reviews.text: This product is great if, like mine, your family gets frequent ear infections. This was easy to set up and use. The video does have a huge lag and will freeze for me but when it “catches up” you do get a great view of the ear. For me it’s still worth it as I am able to check if war pain is being caused by an infection or not. Saved me a few trips to the doctor already!
customer_reviews.author: review

customer_reviews.title: Video quality was poor, and would randomly disconnect requiring me to unplug
customer_reviews.text: Video quality was poor, and would randomly disconnect requiring me to unplug, restart the app and try again. Would like to return but got busy and went past the return timeframe.
customer_reviews.author: K. Miley

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: After I got it, it worked fine. Downloaded the app on my phone (Samsung 8), and everything was as expected for the first week. I checked it after couple of months, the app on the phone does NOT WORK. it crashes every time. Tried uninstalling the app and installing it again. It does NOT work. So the money I paid has gone waste. Would not recommend to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probably not the best tool for cheking your ears,
customer_reviews.text: I will say that the customer support was outstanding, I had a problem with the USB adapters and they worked with me and finally sent new, As it turns out, that probably was not necessary, I was trying to interchange the two adapters when the way it works is that the small adapter plugs into the USB-A adapter, Oh well,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Regular DEPSTECH app does not work, but other apps work
customer_reviews.text: Would have been 5 stars if the app worked but I downloaded the DEPSTECH app and could not get it to connect to my Galaxy S9+ or to my Google Pixel 3 XL but I downloaded a generic USB camera app on the Google Play store, appropriately named, USB Camera, and it works great. Camera is awesome and has many uses besides looking inside your ears. I'm not talking about 'those' other uses you weirdos, but it is great for exploring your mouth and/or nose, just remember to wipe it off and clean it between uses, unless of course you're into that sort of thing, then by all means, fire away.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B.

customer_reviews.title: This is piece of junk with low resolution
customer_reviews.text: You can't get anywhere near the resolution with the actual camera that you see on the listing. The light adjustment is crude and hard to adjust. You either have way too much light or not enough. No way this works on your ears as described.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The instructions are not very clear to help you use ...
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are not very clear to help you use and install the program on to your computer. My computer is a new Macbook Air, but the lag between the device and computer made it unusable. A neat idea that does not work well.
customer_reviews.author: cban

customer_reviews.title: windows 10
customer_reviews.text: works well with windows 10 on a laptop. didn't try it with my android phone. couldn't find the exact download but used the closest one to it. open your laptop camera program>change camera and you're good to go. Takes a little time to practice using but does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS! Doesn't work, seller seems like a scammer
customer_reviews.text: It would not work on my laptop or phone. Everything I read said it would start right up...it didn't. And I tried, read articles, searched YouTube. I returned it. Update: The seller will NOT stop emailing me. They want to fix it. They want me to return it add they'll send a replacement. On and on. Four months! I told them to stop and still they email me.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for ear cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Really impressed with quality and function. It's a must for every family! I was so impressed I bought these for both my adult daughters. They use them for themselves and their kids. It's amazing what you can see in your ears! (that's all I'll say about that.) A great companion to the "Elephant ear" type cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: I Love Gadgets!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I had surgery on my ear many years ago and occasionally still have issues. I wanted very much to see for myself what it looked like. It was amazing to finally get to see. It was easy to set up and easy to use. It came with everything I needed to use this with my Samsung Note 8.
customer_reviews.author: Allyvp

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions and guide.
customer_reviews.text: Could not get this set up to use. Very disappointed in how poorly written the instructions were. Several people tried to help set it up on my Dell laptop and my Samsung Note 8. It just wouldn't work for us.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Amann

customer_reviews.title: Take A Pass
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a week, then quit working. The app used for this otoscope cannot be updated and app does not respond to update attempts. Customer service does not respond despite multiple attempts. I recommend that you dont waste your money on this inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: South Dakota Belle

customer_reviews.title: FUN TOOLS
customer_reviews.text: I m so excited to using this.. if you have alot of stuff to know how to clean your ear inside stuff!! then use this product to connect your phone, and you will be able to see the disguting thing inside the ear!! or even you can use to check nose, mouth, and your teetch
customer_reviews.author: xXWaterLemonXxo

customer_reviews.title: Overall pleased ONCE you find a ph u can upload the App on and actually use it.
customer_reviews.text: Overall pleased once you find a ph u can upload and actually use the App on. My hubby’s Samsung kept crashing & the two converters sent did not fit my iPhone X.... so had to get an older Samsung..... Please consider the new iPhone X’s.... thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kjnnurpl

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Samsung Galaxy S9
customer_reviews.text: Eardrum selfies! Hahaha. Seriously though, this product works as described. I have a Samsung Galaxy S9 and it works fine. I wish it came with disposable ear tips, and longer ear tips, since my ear canal curves a bit. Pretty cool, wish it came with a cleaning tip so I could see it and clean it at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Rosee Posey

customer_reviews.title: App does not work, product is useless.
customer_reviews.text: The camera app doesn't work, so what seemed like a cool tool is useless. There's no customer support for it either. Pretty much, false advert: not android compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Kedi

customer_reviews.title: Saving us money in the long run
customer_reviews.text: This works great! My daughter is prone to ear infections and this has helped us to determine when she has an actual angry ear or if it is just simply teething that is making her fussy and tugging at her ears. Less wasted costs on doctors appointments.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie J. Fitte

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3x use
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after 3 use. I don't use it often to check on my kids ears. But now the apps won't open. And this makes it useless to use for my Android phone
customer_reviews.author: bryan24kaos

customer_reviews.title: Works good!
customer_reviews.text: My mom is a doctor and even when she have her special machines for this, this is just a simple tool easy to take anywhere inside her bag , she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Erika Knowles

customer_reviews.title: does what its suppose to do
customer_reviews.text: Works better than using q-tips without worries of puncturing my ear drums. Seems to stop working if the camera is closed from the phone and then started up again but its not a big deal. Simply unplug and re-plugging it back in fixes the problem.
customer_reviews.author: blairlake24

customer_reviews.title: Must have for a family of hypochondriacs!
customer_reviews.text: Now me and the wife can play doctor for real, and she knows for sure there isn't a "spider" in her ear.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Warlock

customer_reviews.title: app for viewing is incompatible
customer_reviews.text: The app that the product works through to view imaging stopped working. It's not compatible with most phones. You can check app store reviews: it has maybe 2 stars for that problem
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Opaleski

customer_reviews.title: See inside your ears
customer_reviews.text: This is handy for checking out the inside of your ears. The light can feel hot so I wouldn’t recommend using it for long periods of time or with the light at the highest setting. Super easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and just connects to my phone. I did have to download an app but way better than a similar product I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sueppel

customer_reviews.title: So that's what my 👂 looks like.
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit hard to set up the camera. I'm not really tech savvy. Now that I figured it out, I like it. I check my ears weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband thought I was joking when I said I bought this. So glad I did and he understands now. It saves a wasted trip to the audiologist when can get over the counter wax remover to remove the now evident wax build up. Picture is clear enough for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can not connect
customer_reviews.text: I used two devices to attempt to get the camera to connect. Both were unsuccessful. The app kept searching for camera and was never able to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Works great! The tip is a bit large but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The tip is a bit large but it needs to be for a good picture, and I have small ear canals. I tried using Welch Allyn tips and they do not fit, so am stuck reusing the ones they included.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and now the app no longer works, there is no one to contact for help. Waste of money! Not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Wilmoth

customer_reviews.title: this was the perfect answer for a child who would not let me ...
customer_reviews.text: this was the perfect answer for a child who would not let me look in her ear. She inserts this herself and we look at the phone app together so I can teach her if she has an ear infection or not. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not functional
customer_reviews.text: The app does not work, i have been trying since i got it, giving feedback but no use, it seems as garbage that was purchased
customer_reviews.author: Dr Mervyn Sinanan

customer_reviews.title: Combo holder and scope is sweet.
customer_reviews.text: This rocks. The holder is awesome as now it is held very steady vs my hand which may not be. Very nice bundle connects to my computer with just a couple of clicks. Up and running in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: William McDowell

customer_reviews.title: so much easier than a regular otoscope.
customer_reviews.text: pretty easy to use. takes a little bit of time to figure out how to angle the camera for the best picture. I love that it can be displayed on the phone or computer and sent to other people or shared with doctors. very clear image when positioned right.
customer_reviews.author: Sara prindle

customer_reviews.title: This is so cool! You can check your teeth look up your nose look in your ear
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool! You can check your teeth look up your nose look in your ear
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Balsick

customer_reviews.title: Great for at home use!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for at home use!!! I can tell now when my kids have ear infections!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument!
customer_reviews.text: Affordable diagnostic tool which you could use to explain to the patient what you see in real time.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Returned this. The app for Mac is no longer available. This doesn't work on iPhone, so I have no options to use it. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lake girl

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: you do have to practice a little with it to see in the ear good. The picture is clear but you must keep the camara end wiped off or it will blur
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it but I really need a IOS version or Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I would want this with IOS & or Bluetooth capability, I really like the idea of it and when I used it I got great results, but I have an Apple phone so now it’s not being used. I wish I could exchange or put this towards and upgraded version.
customer_reviews.author: Tosha

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to use due to the wiring and multiple components.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and gives a soso image. Could be better. The app didnt work so i used my computer. Update: Customer service was great in helping out i added an extra star for that
customer_reviews.author: L. Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described and worked well with my Samsung Galaxy devices. I wish it had the ability to focus however for the price it will do the job as required.
customer_reviews.author: ChaddersLadyV

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This product does the job perfectly! I was very surprised, considering the low price tag, that the images are crystal clear. I didn’t realize when purchasing that this doesn’t hook up to my iPhone, but it’s easy enough to use with my laptop. Our 4 year old just ruptured an eardrum and we are easily able to check on how things are healing with this device!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley N.

customer_reviews.title: Great product just not for iphone
customer_reviews.text: I was ordering this to use on my phone it didn’t work with my iPhone like I thought it would. And it’s difficult to use on my laptop but the few times I got it to work on laptop picture quality was amazing and it did exactly what I had hopped!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Never saw into my own ear before, was surprised
customer_reviews.text: This product works amazing I don't think any household should be without one
customer_reviews.author: Joewm155

customer_reviews.title: Worked well but broke fast
customer_reviews.text: Worked well but broke after very few uses. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Although the recommended app for this product was not available on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the niftiest little device I have encountered in a long while. I ordered it because my ear had been feeling strange for awhile and the over-the-counter products I tried for wax removal did not work. Although the recommended app for this product was not available on the App Store, I found that I could use Photo Booth (standard with the Mac OS) with excellent results. I was able to see immediately where the wax was located and was able to remove it (using a tool I bought at CVS) with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Richard

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR IOS
customer_reviews.text: NOT FOR IOS Doesn’t even have the connector and or an adapter so if you don’t have usb or android you can’t use.
customer_reviews.author: S. Paglianti

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good off my laptop

customer_reviews.title: Well made, works just like it should
customer_reviews.text: Hooked it up to my Windows PC and had it working in minutes. Does exactly what it's designed to do. It takes a little practice to aim the cone so that you find the eardrum, but once you're there the image is bright, sharp and useful. Appears to be well made, and if properly stored in between uses ought to last.
